answerText: Aurora Leigh[10] This poetry collection by the author of Aurora Leigh includes a poem that begins "Yes, call me by my pet name," as well as a poem that asks "How do I love thee? Let me count the ways," in its 43rd section.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 6 | 10 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Lady Waldemar alerts the title character of this work of Romney's planned marriage to Marian Erle. For 10 points each: [10] Name this long poem that ends with the title character admitting her love for the now blind Romney, whose proposal she had earlier rejected.
